href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.gagex.dagashiyaTW" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.gagex.dagashiyaTW" title="令人感動的養成遊戲 昭和雜貨店物語"> 10.    令人感動的養成遊戲 昭和雜貨店物語  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=GAGEX+Co.,Ltd." title="GAGEX Co.,Ltd.">GAGEX Co.,Ltd.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.co.gagex.dagashiyaTW"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2pwLmNvLmdhZ2V4LmRhZ2FzaGl5YVRXEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  一個能夠回味兒時的感覺，讓人不禁眼角濕潤的養成遊戲。<br>一款藉由經營小小的雜貨店來讓小朋友們聚集，不斷的讓小店成長的故事型態放置類型手遊。<br>不斷的讓雜貨店成長，將那些令人懷念的糖果以及玩具都登錄到圖鑑上吧！<br>「謎之酸酸甜甜的養樂多」「可樂口味的軟糖」「玩具警察手冊」等等、<br>以前玩過這個！的感覺不斷讓人不禁微微一笑，懷念感滿分的道具満載！<br>隨著遊戲的進行，故事也一點一點的向前推進。<br>令人為之感動的故事劇情逐漸明朗的同時，最後是令人意外的結局…!?<br>保證從頭到尾都可以免費進行遊戲，每天都請要記得推進一些些的進度唷。<br>對於日日忙碌而疲憊不堪的您，為您提供一個小小的療癒時刻。<br>【劇情】<br>~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>在懷念感滿滿的那年代的市鎮中靜靜的聳立在那而，那個充滿回憶的小巷子。<br>受到夕陽的照射散發著紅色反光的屋頂。<br>平時和藹可親，生氣的時候會兇兇 這樣的婆婆她，獨自一人經營的一家小小的店面。<br>就在那街角那邊，那間小小的雜貨店的故事。<br>以包藏著如夢中的寶箱一般回憶的小小雜貨店作為舞台，一個有點特別又有點感人的故事即將就要開始。<br>收音機的音樂，刨冰，小水球然後那蟬的叫聲。<br>曾真心希望永遠也別結束，那夏天的某一天…。<br>~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>◎玩法<br>【目的】<br>・從小鬼們的手上搶走他們的零用錢…不對是賺取，之後不斷地讓雜貨店升級！<br>・圖鑑將會逐漸的被那些令人懷念的道具給填滿，目標是全部收齊，加油！<br>・然後欣賞故事的結局吧！<br>【基本規則】<br>(1) 利用「進貨」來增加商品<br>(2) 身上握著大把零用錢的小鬼們（客人們）就會不斷的湧進來<br>(3) 用手指畫過客人的身體來讓他付錢！<br>(4) 當錢越來越多了就可以開始提升「糖果」「玩具」等項目的等級了！<br>(5) 雜貨店成長之後就會有新的道具出現在圖鑑裡面了喔！<br>從(1)到(4)一直不斷的重複這樣的動作就可以不斷的增加手上的現金。<br>一直一直不斷的進行來獲得所有的圖鑑以及完成所有的故事吧。<br>【進貨的規則】<br>執行了進貨之後小店內就會開始慢慢的陳列商品，接著小鬼們就前會來雜貨店購買東西。<br>經過一段時間之後商品就會逐漸賣光而小鬼們也就不會進來了，因此需要定期確認架上的商品並且隨時保持著商品充足的狀態才行。<br>以下幾點可是很重要的喔。<br>◎◎◎ 進貨商品的數量可以從五個階段中選擇 ◎◎◎<br>◎◎◎ 依照選擇的商品數量不同進貨的時間將會持續１５分鐘～８個小時不等 ◎◎◎<br>◎◎◎ 若是進行大量進貨的話商品可以維持較長的時間不會斷貨 不過來雜貨店光顧的小鬼的數量就會變少 ◎◎◎<br>◎◎◎ 若是少量進貨的話雖然商品很快就會沒有 不過小鬼來店裡的機會就會提升 ◎◎◎<br>午休的時候利用少量進貨的方式，睡覺前則是使用大量進貨來讓它長時間放著賣，如此這般的交替使用就可以很有效率的培育您的雜貨店喔！ <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.gagex.dagashiyaTW" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.gagex.dagashiyaTW" tabindex="-1"> <div 5/8改版調整內容<br>【追加功能】<br>●新增4張新海圖(分別為西地中海_4、馬格里布東部_4、小亞細亞_4、黑海_4)<br>●新增劇情(通關主要劇本「襲來！鄂圖曼艦隊」、「尋求機械之謎」，停泊於巴黎以外的歐洲港口)<br>●新增航海士(R尼可拉斯‧克凱巴凱爾) <br>●活動新增每日排行榜<br>活動期間中，會從每天隨機配對的20名中，爭奪那天的活動得分。<br>只要參加了活動就一定可以獲得報酬。<br>每日排行榜從下次舉行的活動開始實行。<br>●選單中新增「世界圖」選項(實行改指令後，現在套用的海圖會在一張畫面中顯示)<br>●新增音量調節功能(從清單的音符按鍵中，可以打開分別細微調整BGM・SE音量的設定畫面)<br>【調整】<br>●有關都市等級和國家親密度變化的處理部分，降低了發生機率<br>●表示任務難易度和敵人強大度的★數，調整為可對應實際的敵方總戰鬥力<br>●有關活動登入禮物，超過獲得期限的會從禮物箱中刪除<p>---------------------------------------------------------------------<br>上市25年　風靡全球千萬航海迷。<br>日本正宗『光榮』旗下大航海V 海上策略遊戲<br>正式於APP／Web雙平台同步推出！</p><p>《大航海時代 V》是《大航海時代》系列睽違15年的經典續作。<br>傳承《大航海時代》系列的特色，結合了「探險」、「交易」、「海戰」三大基本要素，強調高自由度，讓玩家在遊戲中除了扮演像中世紀的熱那亞共和國(今義大利西北部)海洋探險家「克里斯多福·哥倫布」外，還可打造專屬自己的船隻、組織強大的船隊，更可在世界各地不同的城市裡投資、改變勢力版圖。<br>本作更追加了全新要素－可改變世界地形的「多重海圖系統」。透過玩家的航路、探索與交易模式都會有所改變，在征服大海之途增添更多神秘樂趣～</p><p>---------------------------------------------------------------------<br>★歡慶雙平台特典活動　熱烈啟航★<br>1. 提供(評價五星、天天登入送、航海士育成、海戰戰利品增量、召集提督排名競賽)五大特典回饋玩家。<br>2. 即使使用WEB登入，遊戲資料一併同步更新至手機版中喔！讓你隨時隨地都是航海家。<br>3. 更多精彩活動請見遊戲內公告和粉絲團：<br>　【FB粉絲團】https://www.facebook.com/GV5tw<br>　【官方網站】http://gv5.wasabii.com.tw/<br>---------------------------------------------------------------------</p><p>【遊戲特色】<br>1-交易<br>善用巧妙貿易航線來擴充財富，讓港口發展起來。<br>再收購世界各地的特產品，建立自己的流通航路，往大富翁的夢想航行！<br>2-探險<br>探查未知的海域，解開世界各地傳承的謎題～<br>在航海中會取得資材或物品，也隨時會遭遇暴風、捲入海藻、遇見海盜…等事件，請航海士務必在船隻裝備上迴避會引起麻煩事件的物品，讓艦隊得以安全地繼續航行。<br>3-海戰<br>建立屬於自己的強力艦隊，追擊各地邪惡海賊，成就你的海上霸權。<br>船員們隱約感覺到惡名昭彰的海盜船在附近海域虎視眈眈…海戰事件一觸即發！快用港口的「航路設定」以船隻為目標來出航吧！戰鬥中會受３種屬性（近距離、中距離、遠距離）的影響，３種屬性互有相剋關係，會對應這個關係來決定傷害值：<br>● 《強》 遠距離型 → 《弱》 中距離型<br>● 《強》 中距離型 → 《弱》 近距離型<br>● 《強》 近距離型 → 《弱》 遠距離型<br>4-多重海圖系統<br>新加入改變勢力版圖的元素，根據歷史打造獨特的「多人航海地圖」系統，玩家將可翱翔在想像海圖的平行世界中，探索蘊藏不同的文化特色與神祕寶藏！<br>5-航海士培育<br>遊戲中收錄「哥倫布」、「麥哲倫」....等超過100位戰績輝煌的著名風雲人物，玩家可透過刺激多變的「任務列傳」瞭解更多海上勇士的彪功戰炳，隨著歷史故事穿梭時空遨遊在充滿英雄的冒險時代。<br>6-官方繁體中文版，永久免費！</p><p>---------------------------------------------------------------------</p><p>《大航海時代V》出發吧！一起航向偉大的航道！</p><p>【線上客服】http://gv5.wasabii.com.tw/faq/service.shtml<br>【客服專線】+886-2-8751-2168</p><p>※ BADLAND  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Frogmind" title="Frogmind">Frogmind</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.frogmind.badland"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5mcm9nbWluZC5iYWRsYW5kEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  优秀的BADLAND动作冒险类游戏——争夺年度最佳游戏大奖，谋求更好的发展与生存模式<p>玩家人数超过2,000万，并且还在持续增加中！</p><p>5/5 - AppSmile <br>4/4 – Slide to Play <br>5/5 - AppSpy <br>9.2/10 - Multiplayer.it <br>9/10 - Destructoid <br>4.5/5 - TouchArcade </p><p>“BADLAND(迷失之地)是一個令我們愛不釋手的精彩遊戲”——AppSmile“ </p><p>“BADLAND(迷失之地)獨特的大氣效果遊戲性能使它成為了玩家下載遊戲時的必選之作”——Slide to Play </p><p>“BADLAND(迷失之地)不僅畫面美觀，玩起來也是一種絕對享受”——AppSpy“ </p><p>“這是體現卓越品質的一款遊戲”——Destructoid </p><p><br>2013年北歐遊戲Nordic Indie Sensation Award獎得主 <br>Game Connection Europe 2012最佳項目冠軍 <br>Game Connection Europe 2012的SCEE獎得主 <br>PAX 10 2013的精選獨立遊戲 </p><p><br>BADLAND(迷失之地)是一款備受讚譽的動作冒險平台遊戲，擁有大氣效果這一獨特的遊戲性能。故事發生在一座美麗的森林裡，這裡充滿了各種各樣的生物、樹木和花草。雖然這座森林看起來就像童話故事中描述的那樣美麗，但其中似乎隱藏著危險。由玩家控制森林中的一種生物來一探究竟。旅途中，他遇到了許許多多不可思議的陷阱和阻礙。 </p><p>BADLAND(迷失之地)採用基於物理機制的創新型玩法，結合帶有大氣效果的絕美圖案和聲音，將橫向捲軸模式推向了一個新的水平。 </p><p>BADLAND(迷失之地)還頗具獨創性地支持最多4位玩家使用同一台設備進行多人遊戲。在多人模式中，為了生存，玩家可以不擇手段。只要能保全自己，完全可以將你的對手推到旋轉的圓鋸上。 </p><p><br>- 單人模式設有100個非常獨特的關卡，並會在後續的更新中增加更多關卡 <br>- 多人模式最多可支持4位玩家使用同一台設備遊戲，共設23關，更多關卡會在後續的更新中提供 <br>- 支持多達四個玩家的合作模式<br>* 修改後的單人戰鬥模式中，可與朋友們激烈廝殺，一較高低<br>- 直觀的一鍵式控制，關卡設計新穎 <br>- 帶給玩家身臨其境般的遊戲視聽體驗 <br>- 支援 Android 手機及平板<br>-更多關卡和內容將在更新中呈現 </p><p><br>關注我們： <br>Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/badlandgame <br>Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/badlandgame <br>博客 - http://www.badlandgame.com</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=hardideaent.UnknowOrder" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=hardideaent.UnknowOrder" title="未知指令(Unknown Order)"> 21.    未知指令(Unknown Order)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=HardIdeaEnt" title="HardIdeaEnt">HardIdeaEnt</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="hardideaent.UnknowOrder"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2hhcmRpZGVhZW50LlVua25vd09yZGVyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  這是一個適合所有人的遊戲，你必須靈活的運用手指躲避攻擊、或者控制位置，並且快速的思考、想出應對的方法。<p>                                                              壓抑  X 彭湃的心跳  X 屏息以待<br>                                                              玩弄  X 指尖的藝術  X 享受成長<br>                                                              留心  X 標題的提示  X 莫感無助</p><p>                                                             初心    疑惑    恐懼    相信    思考</p><p>                                                                      帶您進入 未知的領域</p><p>                                                                         --Unkonw Order--</p><p>   由台灣兩個年輕人自製的免費手機遊戲，日前在GOOGLE PLAY上架，只要用一根手指頭在黑暗中巡弋冒險，就能體驗腎上腺素不斷飆升的感受。讓你欲罷不能，一玩再玩。</p><p>   滑動主畫面上方可以選取大關卡，點擊下方GO按鈕之後會進入關卡選擇畫面。<br>蒐集藍色過關圓球，可以解鎖新的大關卡。</p><p>   遊戲非常容易操作且好理解，只要閃避障礙物，並且觀察遊戲開始時的標題，就能輕鬆過關。<br>需要注意的是，遊戲中各種物品都需要親自體驗，並沒有過多的文字敘述，因為我們遊戲的主要樂趣就是想要保留玩家對於未知事物的恐懼與陌生，進而發現自己潛伏的反應能力、直覺、及判斷能力。 <br>  <br>   在遊戲初期，第一大關的10個關卡只能算是暖暖身，練練手，在2大關結束後，遊戲才算開始提升難度，玩家必須盡可能的摸索規則及思考如何移動。</p><p>   本作目前開放5大關卡，並在第50關留下了伏筆【是結束，也是開始】，之後會陸續更新各種新元素。<br>各位喜歡刺激，愛好挑戰的玩家們可不要錯過囉，趕快來挑戰看看吧！！！</p><p>聯繫我們:https://www.facebook.com/pages/%E6%9C%AA%E7%9F%A5%E6%8C%87%E4%BB%A4-Unknown-Order/828653587234042</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Clumsy Ninja  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=NaturalMotionGames+Ltd" title="NaturalMotionGames class="description">  如 GooglePlay 2014 年最佳遊戲精選！<p>史上最衰的忍者Clumsy Ninja首度登上觸控式螢幕！<br>訓練、摔打、搔癢，還可以在他身上綁氣球。這些林林總總的方法都可以提升Clumsy Ninja的技巧，幫助他找回失蹤的朋友Kira。 <br>Clumsy Ninja是新一代的互動式遊戲人物！他有知覺、感覺，動作流暢，每次都能做出獨特的反應。你肯定會大為讚嘆…對了，請務必好好照顧他！<br>繫緊腰帶<br>訓練你的忍者學習新花招和超特別的忍者動作！讓他的師父大為激賞，在尋找Kira的路上賺取新的忍者腰帶，或是玩超過70種獨特的互動式物品，包括彈跳床、拳擊沙袋、BB槍、一隻雞，還有…松鼠！<br>探險時刻<br>你可以跟你的忍者到新地點探險，玩新遊戲，認識新人物，完成探險的旅程，尋找有趣好玩的新物品。你會有多少發現呢？<br>專屬特色與分享樂趣<br>你可以根據自己喜愛的風格，為Clumsy Ninja選用專屬的衣服、皮帶和束髮帶。把他最瘋狂的特技拍下來，即時跟朋友分享其中的樂趣。眼睛放亮一點：許多驚喜正等著你！<br>難忘時刻<br>Clumsy Ninja是活生生的虛擬朋友，他會思考和行動，具有真正的智慧－還有很多笨拙的行為！每次玩遊戲，你都可以跟你的忍者及其夥伴一起體驗獨特難忘的時刻！<br>觸控裝置上首見！<br>Clumsy Ninja是首款在觸控裝置上使用EUPHORIA模擬科技的遊戲，可以創造出你前所未見的逼真人物。<br>---- </p><p>請務必連線遊戲，以便獲得最新的內容與功能，以及確保你的資料檔案在線上備份。</p><p>要求 Android 2.3 或更高版本。</p><p>請注意！Clumsy Ninja 是免費的，但其中包含了可以用金錢購買的物品。<br>為了防止未經授權的購買，請在 Google Play 設定功能表中選取「設定或變更 PIN」，建立一個密碼，然後啟用「使用密碼限制購物」選項。此後您將要在每次交易前輸入密碼。請注意，只有 Android OS 3.x 及更高版本提供此選項。</p><p>Clumsy Ninja 的發佈者為 NaturalMotion。 <br>--------------------------------------<br>請在 Facebook:   </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  高畫質、身臨其境的平板電腦遊戲！<p>歡迎來大名鼎鼎的殭屍小鎮，全鎮共4,206人（雖然幾乎是殭屍、嘿嘿）。希望大家在這「極度溫馨」小鎮裡能夠感受到多種不同刺激：探索小鎮、感受與眾不同的風景和聲音（各種呻吟嘶吼）。你可以在小鎮找到各種在地小吃，也能多多認識在地居民（雖然強烈建議避免遇上他們）。小鎮中最受歡迎的娛樂活動？當然就是打殭屍啦──你所發現的各種獨特武器或是柑仔店賣的在地特產都能用，快來挑兩把你最順手的武器來試試手氣吧。至於小鎮的住宿，不用懷疑、絕對要找一個安全的避難所 - 務必將門窗上鎖，不然有很多居民隨時等著叫你起床上廁所呢！希望大家玩得開心，有個愉快地狩獵之旅！</p><p>◆隨心所欲打造自己的特殊形象-數百件獨特商品，各種武器、服裝與裝備</p><p>◆清掃避難所附近的殭屍、上街多撿撿補給物資-各種造型怪異、獨一無二的武器、許多有用的物資，還有不同隱藏版驚喜</p><p>◆各種刺激探險活動- 小鎮各地的餐廳、公寓、派出所甚至柑仔店，到處都有驚喜在等著你...當然，你得在小鎮居民抓住你之前返回避難所屍讓你！</p><p>◆尋找其他生還者─依照自己的喜好去探索一條嶄新的劇情路線吧</p><p>歡迎加入我們粉絲團，隨時可得到《殭屍小鎮》的最新消息和更新：<br>facebook.com/ ZombiesAteMyFriends</p><p>殭屍小鎮可以免費參與本遊戲 deserts and deep underground caves.<br>• Keep an eye on their needs - give them sleep, feed them, create clothing and shelter - and they'll be happier, quicker and more productive.<br>• Craft tools href="/store/apps/details?id=air.HardTime" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.HardTime" title="Hard Time (Prison Sim)"> 83.    Hard Time (Prison Sim)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MDickie" title="MDickie">MDickie</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.HardTime"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDGFpci5IYXJkVGltZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Create your own inmate and attempt to survive in a prison where every sentence is a "death" sentence! Rub shoulders with up to 100 fellow inmates in a sprawling jail of 12 unique areas, each filled with fully interactive furniture and props. Plus a life beyond the jail populated by real civilians, with wardens enforcing dozens of different laws to stop you from making a break for it.<p>Each day, you will find your health and mental state slipping away. Both can be restored by sleeping - which is also a good way to pass time. You won't always be permitted to sleep, though, so consuming food and drink bridges the gap. These, along with many other activities such as reading or watching TV, can also help to improve your mental state. If you "lose your mind" you will break down and will temporarily lose control of your character (almost certainly getting into trouble!).</p><p>Your character also has a set of attributes that you are challenged to improve:<br>- STRENGTH indicates how much damage you can inflict or absorb. You can improve it by fighting or lifting weights.<br>- AGILITY determines how fast you move. You can improve it by jogging in the yard or scoring baskets.<br>- INTELLECT reflects your knowledge - including fighting skills such as counters. You can improve it by reading books.<br>- REPUTATION is how much other prisoners respect you. It can be improved by accomplishing tasks or intimidating others.</p><p>There are also opportunities to earn money - whether you work for it with a broom, trade items at a profit, or run with a gang. Having money increases your opportunities to grease the wheels and make your life inside easier.</p><p>You may find that you need to go to the toilet from time to time, in which case you must race to the bathroom! Alternatively, you could find a toilet to sit on or grab some toilet paper to spare your blushes. Failing to do so will damage your reputation and mental state.</p><p>I regret that there is more to this game than I could ever explain here, so I hope you enjoy figuring some things out for yourself.</p><p>Upgrade to "VIP" to enjoy the full experience without ads - plus access to the editor that allows you to customize your character and every other.</p><p>BASIC CONTROLS:<br>(*Look out for tutorials within the actual game)<br>The game uses buttons where letters like GTA represent what they do:<br>G = Grapple / Throw weapon<br>T = Taunt (interact with handheld props)<br>A = Attack (on its own to kick, with a direction to punch)<br>R = Run<br>P = Pick-Up / Drop</p><p>OTHER CONTROLS<br>- Press ATTACK and RUN together to launch a powerful attack.<br>- Press any button with any direction (or none) in a grapple to trigger different moves.<br>- Press RUN and PICK-UP together to set fire to a small object (which can then be used to set fire to a large object).<br>- Touch the clock to pause the game and bring up options to exit.<br>- Touch any speech bubble to speed through conversations.</p><p>PERFORMANCE<br>- If you find your device struggles to display lots of characters, considering keeping the "Population" option low.<br>- "Speed Up Frame Rate" sleeping will require good performance at the default frame rate.<br>- Head to the "Display" options to tone down other features.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.HardTime" class="description">  這是描繪單相思戀情的女性向戀愛遊戲。 <p>◆故事內容<br>繼承龐大遺產的條件……竟是和結婚！ ？ <br>妳身為一名年輕的後起之秀設計師，某天突然面對這樣的要求。 </p><p>妳向真士坦白妳的情意，卻被無情地打碎。 <br>跟以往憧憬的真士「假結婚」之後，妳將踏上怎樣的路途？<br>妳會選擇巨額遺產？完成身為設計師的夢想？還是一圓至今隱藏已久的真心……？</p><p>妳和他是「秘密的２人」。 <br>妳將握住哪個人的手呢？ </p><p>◆遊戲規則 <br>遊戲採用視覺小說模式。<br>劇情將依妳的選擇而有所變化。 <br>或成就愛情，或以設計師的身分一展鴻圖，或獲得龐大的遺產，<br>這全憑妳進行遊戲時所下的決定。<br> <br>在遊戲中選對選項，提升他的好感度。 <br>不同的選項，好感度的分數也有所不同。<br>請選擇他最有可能會喜歡的對話或動作吧！ <br>好感度的高低，將影響妳的結局。 <br>遊戲中沒有麻煩的任務，妳可以隨心所欲地推進劇情。 </p><p>◆攻略對象 <br>【妳所憧憬的人】鷹司真士 <br>他本來應該是妳伸手也無法觸及的王子殿下。<br>雖然妳憧憬著他，他卻莫名地討厭妳。<br>然而，他不僅跟妳假結婚，甚至立下誓言，與妳接吻…… <br>「妳是我的妻子……僅僅一年的妻子！」<br>雖然他這麼說，但其實……</p><p>鷹司諒哉 <br>難以捉摸、灑脫超然的他， <br>搗亂妳和真士的婚姻，企圖佔遺產為己有。然而…… <br>「……為了妳，我可以捨棄全部！」</p><p>■可免費享受精彩的愛情故事！鷹司真士1st～4th Story一口氣推出！ <br>以上流仕紳「鷹司家」為故事舞台，妳將和自我中心、冷酷迷人的真士，以及難以捉摸、灑脫超然的諒哉……等等充滿魅力的攻略對象，共譜令妳小鹿亂撞、玩味不已的愛情戀曲。 </p><p>遊戲一上架，就一口氣推出以下劇情： <br>・鷹司真士1st Story<br>・鷹司真士2nd Story<br>・鷹司真士3rd Story<br>・鷹司真士4th Story</p><p>接下來預計推出以下劇情：<br>・鷹司諒哉1st Story<br>・文化祭特別活動<br>・秋遊特別活動<br>・聖誕節特別篇<br>・情人節特別篇<br>・白色情人節篇</p><p>今後也會陸續推出新的劇情和特別活動哦！ </p><p>■本遊戲特別推薦給以下人士 Wolf Online  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=1Games" title="1Games">1Games</a>   <span 最真實的網路生存遊戲!為了生存,不僅要躲開其他動物的獵殺行動，留意同伴間的搶食，還要與不同種族的狼死鬥。 "網狼" 延續締造全球五百億下載量第一名的"狼的一生"系列的風格, 要帶給大家最刺激,最熱血的動物線上遊戲。我們正等著你-最勇猛最高明的狼戰士加入我們的行列!！</p><p><br>[種族介紹]<br>山狼: 生活在最險峻的岩山區，天生俱有一定的水準的能力。<br>雪狼:生活在終年冰雪覆蓋的暴風雪區，擁有絕佳的狩獵能力及速度。<br>野狼:生活在野獸區，保留狼最原始的野性，是三種狼族中最兇殘,最具有侵略性的種族。</p><p>[遊戲特色]<br>1. 最真實的狼族互鬥遊戲<br>- 各項能力都有一定水準的山狼，冷血迅速的雪狼及兇殘的野狼, 這三個種族各提供了四隻不同的狼戰士， 你可以依自己喜好在12隻狼中選擇一隻自己專屬的狼戰士。<br>2. 提供不同的戰鬥模式<br>- 你可以選擇自己單打獨鬥，或是和其他狼族來場對戰，甚至可以與各地的玩家通力合作打敗龍..等等模式哦！<br>3. 最強的狼戰士身邊必有許多好伙伴。<br>-你可以和你的族人一起享受狩獵的快感及分享食物。<br>4. 當你玩到累的時候，還能馬上招喚出你的同伴。<br>- 當你感到疲倦或陷入危險時，你馬上就能呼喚線上的伙伴來幫助你。<br>5.角色能力會經由狩獵成長<br>藉由狩獵及等級提升，你的攻擊力，防禦力，速度及精力值也將會大幅提升。<br>6. 能看到各式各樣的動物及傳說中的怪獸<br>-不只是兔子、鹿、長頸鹿這類的草食動物，還有像肉食性的獅子、老虎、熊，甚至是希臘故事中才會出現的地獄三頭犬及奇美拉，傳說中的吸血蝙蝠及龍，都會常常出現在遊戲中。<br>7. 提供六種不同的格鬥及狩獵地圖<br>- 遊戲包含六種如同真實場景的格鬥及狩獵地圖: 暴風雪區，野獸區，格鬥區，火龍熔岩區及岩山區<br>8. 其他功能<br>- 精力值會隨時間或是食用死屍而增加<br>- 可同步與玩家們進行線上聊天</p><p>https://www.facebook.com/wolfonlinegame?fref=ts</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> 你獨自來到山谷階梯處。<p>全身裝備僅一個空提箱，腦海中的記憶一片模糊...你決心探索曾經在這裡生活的點點滴滴。</p><p>在入口的階梯處，一個熟悉的幻影出現，你從這個幻影身上得到的答案寥寥無幾，模糊的記錄讓你遠離城鎮。</p><p>近十年來，你受到健忘症的苦苦折磨，面對隱約可見的過去，你開始探索忘卻的秘密，拼湊從前生活的場景，確定瞭解失蹤的家人和曾經興旺繁榮的村莊發生了什麼事情。</p><p>你攜帶的裝備只有一個提箱、一本書和一個指南針，但是卻要漫遊荒涼的的山谷，收集線索，解決謎題和拼圖，並找到有過去線索的日記。</p><p>你揭開的秘密會超乎想像嗎？</p><p>---------------------- </p><p>直觀設計：</p><p>專為玩家所需開發，拼圖為新手和頂級玩家而設計，易於導航山谷世界。</p><p>炫酷逼真的美工：</p><p>山谷世界外觀夢幻逼真，場景和位置充滿炫酷細節和鮮明特色。</p><p>專業音樂和聲音：</p><p>專業錄製的音訊和震撼聲效讓山谷顯得逼真，動感十足。</p><p>好玩的魅力遊戲和故事：</p><p>本遊戲的故事和謎題會深深吸引你，即使不玩，也讓你身不由已，喚起你的遊戲興趣，探索山谷背後的真相和秘密。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> 女巫試圖攻克海茲維奇，威脅要讓過去的秘密浮上檯面！這還不打緊，惡鬼在你身邊遊蕩，離奇的謀殺案之後，恐怖的圖形持續在陳屍間出現。你準備好面對強大的邪惡勢力，拯救你被圍困的故鄉…甚至整個世界嗎？<br>自從你的父母失蹤，你離開海茲維奇後，許多年已過去。你的祖父突然緊急要你回去，可想而知一定又有什麼奇怪的事發生了。到達車站的時候，沒有人跟你碰面，整個小鎮陰鬱安靜，冒名奇妙停電了，窗戶爬滿奇怪的藤蔓。更糟的是，你的車票上沒有回程日期！難道你注定要永遠困在這裡？這個世界到底是真是假？這一切是否都跟多年前被打破的那面神秘的阿維蒂法之鏡有關？<br>和隔壁可愛的阿曼達見面，一起反抗邪惡勢力。遊走在荒涼的街道上，幫海茲維奇擺脫那些想要將你的世界毀掉的幽靈力量！<p>你可以在遊戲中的透過應用程式內購買解鎖額外獎勵！</p><p>● Left to fend for herself, she has been forced to learn how to survive in a world gone mad. Many months have passed since the events seen in Season One of The Walking Dead, and Clementine is searching for safety. But what can an ordinary child do to stay alive when the living can be just as bad – and sometimes worse – than the dead? As Clementine, you will be tested by situations and dilemmas that will test your morals and your instinct for survival. <div class="description"> </span> </div>  <div class="description"> This is a game about collecting and protecting items while playing with actual human beings from all around the world.  Your items CAN and WILL be stolen if you don't keep them safe.  That is part of the gameplay, and stolen items will not be restored.  All of the items necessary to prevent theft are available in the game.  USE THEM WISELY!<p>PARENTS:  There is a Parental Controls area in the Options menu - it allows you to disable buying Gems and Tapjoy Offer Wall options as well as block chat with other players.</p><p>Growtopia is a creative sandbox platformer MMO where you can:</p><p>* BUILD anything you can imagine – houses, dungeons, song, artwork, puzzles, etc<br>* COLLABORATE with real people - there have been over eight million player accounts created, all in the same universe, no sharding!<br>* PLAY mini-games - parkour, surgery, quizzes, PVP battles, CTF, races, and more<br>* PROTECT items using an innovative lock system which allows you to give access to friends<br>* PLANT seeds to grow trees<br>* SPLICE seeds to discover hundreds of amazing items, with new items added constantly<br>* TRADE items in our secure trading system<br>* EXPLORE a universe of over 150+ MILLION user-created worlds, all persistent and connected to each other<br>* COMMUNICATE using a full chat and messaging system<br>* EARN a single in-game currency entirely through gameplay<br>* See classic pixel graphics, optimized for small and large screens<br>* Hear the original soundtrack by Cory Mollenhour<br>* Your account is usable with clients on all platforms (Android, iOS, Win, and Mac)</p><p>Didn't get your gems or having a problem? Shall we date?:Blood in Roses+  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=NTT+Solmare+Corp." title="NTT Solmare Corp.">NTT Solmare Corp.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.nttsolmare.game.android.biref"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWNvbS5udHRzb2xtYXJlLmdhbWUuYW5kcm9pZC5iaXJlZhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The game is set at the castle called ‘Hotel Libra Sincera’ which connects the dark world and the human world. This is the story of a heroine, who is taken her blood by vampires, trying to find the mystery behind the castle with her partner, experiencing a romantic love with him.<p>About Story: <br>The heroine of the game meets a beautiful and bloodcurdling kind, ‘Vampires’ at the castle connecting the dark world and the human world. One day, she is taken her blood by the vampires. If she fails to find and drink the evening dew from the Rose Garden within ten days, she is told to be turned into a vampire. Nurturing a love with her partner, she struggles to find the Rose Garden somewhere in the castle, and reveal its mystery.</p><p>Game Features:<br>* FREE to play! Some items are needed at every checkpoint to proceed reading the stories.<br>* Choose from a variety of unique male characters: Alfred, Rupert, Jack and Daniel as your possible partner.<br>* Multiple endings for each male character. The ending can be changed depending on what you choose to act or react in the episodes. <br>* Attractively written and expressed the original setting and concept in the game. The scenes are dynamically written and articulated in both serious and comical tastes.<br>* Many fine illustrations of Japanese comic, manga and anime arts in the game; the art style is deeply inspired by Japanese anime.<br>* Enjoy your cosplay with a variety of accessories and items in the avatar game!</p><p>FOLLOW US:<br>facebook.com/ShallWeDate.NTTSolmare (*LIKE us if you enjoy our game!)<br>youtube.com/user/ShallWeDate</p><p>ABOUT US:<br>Thank you very much for your interests and downloads of our games! <br>NTT Solmare is a Japanese game company, especially focusing to bring Japanese visual novels and Otome games to the world! Unleash your fighting skills in this vast pixilated world where the battles are harder hitting, you pack bigger punches and you enjoy double the action.  Tear through waves of enemies. This FPS showdown is set to begin...<p>~~~Prepare for devastating battles~~~</p><p>Scene: After the annihilation of the robots who came to claim the human race, the world is returning to normal and setting to rights what was destroyed by the wars.</p><p>As the president of the unified nations, he was nearly flawless in his capacity to appease other countries and maintain the safety of his own. There was only one problem, and one virtually everybody believed he was human and only a select few knew the devastating truth that that he had replaced the ailing statesman who was in a coma. A perfect carbon copy, he actually did a better job of processing information than his human counterpart. In a matter of days, he had surmised a plan to balance the budget that would work with both parties and he had even managed to negotiate numerous peace accords. What happened after these deals were brokered is what would rattle the nations...</p><p>~~~~The robot race has revived and the human world is about to suffer the consequences~~~</p><p>What the world did not know was that while he was executing what all thought were peace treaties with other nations, what was actually transpiring was the revival of the robot clans that were thought to be destroyed. These powerful enemies have returned and they are more devastating than ever before. This time they are smarter, more equipped and unbeknownst to mankind, were being sneaked into roles and assuming great power throughout the nations. When these robots reveal the truth and demand fidelity, the human race refuses and thus is born the next and great human-robot war.</p><p>Chapter 1 <br>Hidden dangers lurk everywhere, even in the unassuming rail ways. Become the hero and kill all the robot agents. Feel the danger as you frantically fight for survival. Blast through dozens of foes and show them who the true hero is and who will dominate at the end of the day.</p><p>Chapter 2 <br>Lay siege to the capitol where the heart of  trouble lies. Run, shoot and dodge as you work to breech the fortress walls along the outer perimeters of this renowned building. Take control over the enemy and crumble his defenses.</p><p>Chapter 3 <br>Navigate treacherous confines of a nuclear reactor facility where the robot president is planning to corrupt the water systems with a formula that will devastate the human race and brand them his loyal followers. The ultimate showdown is at hand. Bring down this enemy once and for all in an intense second round of this deadly robot-human war</p><p>☠Features☠</p><p>Intense battles<br>Unstoppable enemies<br>Vast, labyrinthine landscapes<br>Legendary melee and firearm weaponry<br>Play to survive<br>Stunning 3D pixel graphics</p><p>NOTE: Transforming Survival Games 2 is not associated with Minecraft or any of its skins or textures. <div class="description">  ▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▲▼▲▼ <br>正宗魔物獵人系列手機卡牌策略遊戲 <br>最新「七龍盃」超激獵團對戰火熱開打！！ <br>活用大狩獵鍛鍊的實力、透過石像能量槽發動戰鬥Bonus <br>找出專屬各位獵團的最強戰術，一分高下！ <br>充滿愛與勇氣的狩獵之路，你能夠成功挑戰王國並且成為發現秘境之謎的第一人嗎? <br>跟狩友們合作協力~~即刻解放所有蓄積之力！！ <br>▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▼▲▲▼▲▼ <p>狩獵目標：<br>前往秘境探險，喚醒擁有強大力量的七龍卡牌，<br>拯救逐漸被魔物侵蝕的【卡魯多匹亞】王國，<br>發現隱藏在秘境之中的王國的秘密！</p><p>※　或許只有你能拯救「卡魯多匹亞」了。。。 <br>某一天，和平的王國「卡魯多匹亞」突然被大量來自異世界的「獵人」和「魔物」卡牌侵襲 <br>世界裡開始不斷出現火山、雪山、樹海和沙漠等領域，魔物卡牌的威勢也變得越來越猛烈。 <br>女王決定要討伐魔物和進行秘境探索，舉行互相較勁並狩獵魔物的「大狩獵」以及決定最強獵人的「七龍盃」，大規模招集能夠熟練操控卡牌力量的卡牌獵人。 <br>只有勝出者，才能得到秘境探索的權利。賭上了沉睡著強大力量的秘境探索權利，卡牌獵人們之間的激烈勝負就此展開！ </p><p>※　魔物獵人系列元素集結登場。。。 <br>熟悉的魔物獵人系列魔物、素材、道具等集結登場，卡牌強化、覺醒、鑲嵌裝飾品等多樣系統讓你組成獨一無二的超強隊伍，拯救王國！ </p><p>※　傳說大狩獵戰鬥中。。。 <br>除了獵人們的策略，跟玩家間即時的協力合作才是勝負的關鍵！ <br>由5個獵團以狩獵魔物的技巧相互競爭，每日開戰兩場！每組由5個獵團進行積分競賽，你跟夥伴們能夠活用最強牌組，掌握魔物的弱點屬性及部位，並召喚傳說中的獵團魔物成為冠軍嗎？ </p><p>※　只有透過探索任務。。。 <br>才能找出散布在各地的魔物卡牌，若不盡快找出他們並加以討伐，難以預料會對周遭產生甚麼影響！獵人們熟悉的搬蛋、烤肉、採礦等多樣任務挑戰成功的話，將成為拯救王國之路上的一大助力！ </p><p>※　未開拓之地秘境沉睡著一股巨大的獵人及魔物之力。。。 <br>只有不斷地前往探索並找出卡牌，才能開拓秘境，找出潛藏在秘境之中的卡牌！獲得秘境探索券將是你跟獵團夥伴們獲得傳說卡成為傳說獵人的首要目標！ ╋━━━━━<br>傳說中，創世神創造了由無數星空組成的二次元世界，被稱之為夢想大陸。可惜有一天遭到神秘的巨人入侵，整個大陸在短時間內就被巨人掌控和主宰！『當邪惡降臨大地，勇者將破除空間枷鎖、穿越星空之門！』三次元世界的勇者被召喚到「創世神殿」中，在充滿危險的二次元進行探索，並逐漸成長，收到來自各方加入的神秘英靈盟友加入。漸漸地一個驚天的秘密也逐步揭曉……</p><p>━━━━━╋ 特色系統 你是紫醉金迷世界中唯一主角：在流俗諂媚的經紀公司中打拼上游，在自私狡詐的上流社會裡力求生存，還要與令人又愛又恨的狗仔隊過招......現在開始，你不再受人擺佈，要奮力闖出自己的星光大道！<br>★ 打造自己心中完美無暇的最佳男女主角：從長相到服裝，近百個的選項任君挑選！<br>★ 在最夯的電視真人秀裡嶄露頭角，從大製作的電影中閃耀全球：挑選好角色，賺超高人氣、奪最大獎項！<br>★ Вы оказались в новом для вас неизведанном мире в котором нет конца. Исследуйте все места этого мира, создайте себе оружие и броню, постройте собственное убежище чтобы спастись от свирепых хищников и зомби которые обитают в шахтах и выбираются на ружу по приходу ночи. <p>Создавайте собственные фермы, пасите кур, овец, баранов и коров. Собирайте яйца, молоко и мясо чтобы кормить себя. Садите урожай, но будьте бдительны - лесные хищники готовы напасть в любой момент на ваш скот! </p><p>В игре существует 3 мира: </p><p>1. Замок черной силы: создайте уникальное оружие и броню, исследуйте крепость самого злого короля Survival Craft и уничтожьте ее! Сделать это будет сложно, замок очень большой! </p><p>2. Европейский городок: станьте жителем старого заброшенного городка в глубинах Европы. Постройте собственный дом, развивайте фермерскую деятельность. Кормите своих коров, они будут давать вам молоко! Огородите своих куриц забором чтобы они не сбежали. Заведите собаку чтобы она защищала ваш скот от диких хищников! Но будьте осторожны, деревню контролируют древние войны.</p><p>3. Домик на дереве: найдите в диких лесах Джунглей домик на дереве! Дом огромен и заброшен. Вы можете его сжечь, либо поселиться в нем. Постройте собственную комнату и надежную дверь, чтобы хищники не смогли пробраться в ваши владения. Проведите несколько ночей на дереве в безопасности! </p><p>Особенности игры: <br>- Добавлен скот: курицы, коровы, лошади, кролики, собаки, кошки, мышь, насекомые!<br>- Добавлены зомби, лесные хищники, катаклизмы, смена дня и ночи.<br>- Заброшенные шахты, пещеры, хищины и даже корабли.<br>- Много видов уникального оружия, брони в средневековом стиле. <br>- Режим выживание и креатив<br>- И много Обитатели пещер не очень любят чужаков.</p><p>• Создавай!<br>В MainCraft Вы можете создавать различные предметы для себя и своего дома, будь то различные инструменты для добычи ресурсов (лопаты, топоры, кирки, мечи и др.), а так же различные сундуки, двери, окна, печи и много чего еще.</p><p>• Ешь!<br>В игре присутствует шкала сытости главного героя. Ночь в игре очень тёмная и страшная. По наступлению тёмного времени суток, дикие животные начнут на Вас нападать, а Вам придётся обороняться или прятаться в своём убежище. <br>可是由於和一個犯人打架，你的腦部受傷，在有健忘癥的情況下！如何找到你自己藏好的“錘子”？來實施越獄計劃的第一步，現在就來尋找線索吧！ <p>√提示： <br>1 極限難度：低於10%的人可以通關，確實很多用戶表示很囧。 <br>2 在每個場景中都有隱藏的線索，收集到相關的物品才可以找到“錘子”，需要一點點耐心哦～～ <br>3 關於遊戲：恐龍入侵包括2個主要城市的水平和20波的水平。有3支步槍和火箭筒1槍。<p>哦，我的上帝殘忍可怕的野獸生物襲擊我市的舊時代報仇！我們的城市和居住地在他們的攻擊和毆打。不是一個，不是兩個而是三個可怕的巨型怪物殺手食肉動物！現在追捕他們或者被追殺！踏上了一生的時間去殺死他們在恐龍獵人終極遊戲的恐龍狩獵遠征：哦，是恐龍，最致命的生活吸盤，英雄恐龍狩獵冒險終於在Android！如果你是玩在平板電腦上，讓高清版！攻擊性十足，獸之王。誰曾經統治地球的恐龍致命的是回來了！早在上城。恐龍破壞的跡象，叢林森林棲息地，所有的時間最致命的獵人殺手野獸。這是迪諾餓了，找他的下一頓飯，他們是不是友好！<br>他們什麼都可以吃，撕掉機構和閃光燈外，還喜歡喝血像吸血鬼，動搖他們的受害者，他們的獵物打，殺了他們悲慘，無情的暴力命中後吃。這不是Safari瀏覽器，而不是大猩猩，但恐龍物種異特龍，迅猛龍和迅猛，這些人吃的，野蠻的動物都是野生的，憤怒的，瘋狂和飢餓。面對他們，消滅他們。<br>一流的＃1遊戲，動作包裝。提供了一個相對高品質的體驗（3D模型和3D聲音）。他們已抓獲的城市;他們失去了控制，炸開了鍋，在你的城市運行騷亂。野獸橫行的城市。粉碎成轎車和卡車移動。一鼓作氣過路燈，圍牆和郵箱。可以肯定，看看周圍所有的角落，發現所有的地圖的秘密。<br>像一個專業的獵人經驗 - 加載你的槍，快和小心！飢餓的恐龍圍著你，所以盡量在這個挑戰中生存！<br>遊戲特色：<br>- 巨大的3D世界，開放的探索！<br>- 品質HD圖形<br>- 極品倖存者戰鬥機殺手<br>- 運行，但是第一個殺！<br>- 3D恐龍<br>- 兩個令人興奮的遊戲模式：<br>- 狩獵和殺戮：貼近現實的狩獵經驗，讓玩家透過廣大的景觀漫遊，<br>- 跟踪和狩獵各種恐龍。<br>- Assassin’s Creed® IV Companion  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Ubisoft+Entertainment" title="Ubisoft Entertainment">Ubisoft Entertainment</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.ubisoft.assassin.blackflag"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS51Ymlzb2Z0LmFzc2Fzc2luLmJsYWNrZmxhZxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Elevate your Assassin’s Creed 4 Black Flag experience with this unique companion app. Turn your tablet device into a second screen that provides you with features that further immerse you into this Caribbean world.<p><br>PLEASE NOTE: To get the most out of your app, you will need to sync with your copy of Assassin’s Creed IV Black Flag on your gaming platform.</p><p><br>*** Assassin's Creed IV's companion app is pretty rad – Destructoid</p><p><br>Assassin’s Creed Black Flag’s Companion is an indispensable tool for all would-be pirate captains. It acts like your very own quartermaster, so that you will never need to break the immersion and flow of gameplay by pausing the game to navigate through certain menus. You are now free to fully concentrate on the job at hand - to gain wealth and infamy on the high seas and in exotic cities.</p><p><br>Login with Uplay to fully enjoy the following features:</p><p><br>INTERACTIVE WORLD MAP<br>More exhaustive than your in-game map; see your mission objectives in real-time, set waypoints, zoom in and out, and search for locations with the tip of your finger. It’s also a great way to involve someone else in your single player experience, your friend can be your quartermaster.</p><p><br>KENWAY’S FLEET<br>You can now interact with the main game 24/7, wherever you may be. Use the ships that you have captured to send on missions, secure routes and collect cargo and currency. The Atlantic Ocean is thriving with opportunities and you’ll need many ships to take full advantage. You can even help secure your Uplay friends’ routes and get rewarded.</p><p><br>PROGRESS TRACKER<br>All your game data is stored here, including main mission progress, crafting completion, and your current game status.</p><p><br>TREASURE MAPS<br>Find treasure maps in-game and see them on your second screen while you cross-reference the real-world location on your TV.</p><p><br>INITIATES FEED<br>Display received messages, notifications from your friends and find community challenges.</p><p><br>ANIMUS DATABASE<br>Easily view, at your leisure, all the Animus Database entries unlocked in the main game.</p><p></p><p>Note:<br>• Kenway’s Fleet, the Animus Database and real time updated information require an internet connection to function correctly.<br>• The application requires a Uplay account to synchronize your game data.</p><p><br>Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag Companion is compatible with PS4, Xbox One, PS3, Xbox 360, Wii U and It all starts here!<p>✦Dominate Action-Packed Campaigns✦</p><p>A rip, a rift in the delicate veil that separates the kingdom of the gods from the human race. This breech has opened up a veritable vortex that has born one of the most dangerous and powerful demigods known across all the realms. Crossing through the veil, the mighty demigod arrives with his legions in an invasion against the nation to rule all human beings...</p><p>Frost has touched the world, painting it a silver that blankets the world in a new beginning. Apparently Mother Nature has not received the memo that a storm is brewing and this new beginning is not virginal, but will bring bloodshed as the beats of the underworld successfully brought to Earth prowl the nations under the direct of their master. She does not know there will be no peace. She knows not the domineering intentions of this omnipresent demigod...</p><p>As an elite agent of a powerful office, when word that global security has been threatened by this immortal presence, it is up to you to heed the call and see to it that this evil force does not defeat the human race in a quest to conquer and enslave block kind.  </p><p>LEVEL #1<br>Winter has spread her icy fingers over the land, while Jack Frost blows his mighty wind, covering the tracks of the mighty and making your quest that much harder. Among the frozen lakes, the towering pines and the hills of snow, you find it all too easy to locate the enemy. Perhaps because they are in turn, looking for you...</p><p>LEVEL #2<br>A great divide sets the stage for a battle, a confrontation of wills, pitting mortals against gods in the fight for dominance. There's no place to hide, so plan your attacks well. An agent must always have a steady head and an even steadier hand is he is to conquer of his enemies. </p><p>LEVEL #3<br>In the remote foothills of your native nation, where the dividing veil separates the mighty from the flawed, the final battle will take place. Run, climb, jump, shoot, punch... whatever it takes to ensure your land is not overwhelmed by these mysterious foes. Defeat them all and close this gateway for good. </p><p><br>**** PLEASE NOTE THE LEVEL SIZE *****</p><p>For the most awesome immersive game play ever, Avenge Kings of Block Shadow boasts levels that are HUGE! It has the best fun run game with good graphics and music.<p>***Features***</p><p>1. Tap the screen to make bunny run.</p><p>2. Collect all the carrots without being caught by farmer.</p><p>3. The Lone machine fights for his survival in apocalyptic times.<p>***** A non-stop infinite flying. <br>***** Floating obstacles made up of cosmic circuits.<br>***** Three amazing powerups. Additional life, Laser Destroyer, Shield, supersonic flyer.</p><p><br>Highly challenging...try your skills in flying now. The year was 2868 AD. Mankind was nearing extinction as a result of extreme experimentation on anti-matter. The rebels of the program quietly shfted their base to north pole. They were against experiments on anti matter but were technological freaks themselves.<br>In secret they created the LABS. Their plants ran on neural energy. They had devised ways to tap energy flowing through human neural currents. It was so much that they needed nothing else. Now, they created the ultimate weapon to counter the forces of anti-matter realm. They had to start by killing the scientists at the anti-matter lab.</p><p>They created the ultimate bot which could fly at great speeds. It could even transform itself. In a way, it was a shapeshifter too. But the most important part was the brain which was human. Inside the head of the bot was a complete nanotech facility which could preserve the brain and maintain its biochemical functions. It is linked to a pilot in the LABS which is YOU. The pilot could fly the bot through the anti-gravity room at the LABS. It was as simple.<br>But they forgot one thing. The brains inside the bots were of the scientists at the AM lab. Thats how they knew how to approach and destroy the LABS.<br>They could control everything but the dark desires of the brain. The bots were always aware . They duplicated in secret their own species and soon the world was filled hundreds of them fighting each other.  Humans extincted. The Robo survived on atmospheric electricity.<br>They would use the energy of the nearby space reducing it to energy less field so they have to keep moving.<br>Since it was moving for survival the bots had placed obstruction in each other's paths to prevent others from moving and die in stagnation. </p><p>Obstacles:<br>1. Space circuits: These are 4- Dimensional . They are 3D in space and could teleport itself in time if not consumed. So, 4D. They are consumed only when a bot passes through them to its death and to the death of the circuit.<br>2. Mines: The mines are composed of enriched uranium. Its blast can reduce a bot to ashes. <br>3.Rockets: The third type of obstacles are the rockets. They are composed of plutonium and travel at speeds of 200 miles/hour. They are aware and can change their direction to seek the target like a guided missile. It detects the robo through its brain waves and not through heat trailing.</p><p>Background: The background is filled with apocalyptic scene. There are broken machine parts and ashes everywhere. Gears, Levers, sprockets,chains, belts, hydraulic fluids, nuts and bolts of old dead bots. In distant space there are planets breaking apart.  Their entire sphere is exploding. They are now in disfigured state reducing to bits and pieces. Its all gloom.</p><p>Path:  The surface on which you run is filled with craters. They are formed by asteroids, meteors, meteorites as well as by the fall of heavy Robo. each robo was above 300 feet  tall and weighed over 20,000 tonnes.</p><p>Beware of the landmines too.</p><p>Powerups: <br>Supersonic speed: The electric circuits produces so much electricity that a small amount of it is lost and goes up in space and forms a kind of bubble. Over long periods of time these energy bubbles become extremely powerful. They are in latent state so they do not burn but can be harnessed as energy by the bot.<br>Plasma waves: Plasma waves brings on a twister which engulfs and reduces to ashes all obstacles. They are magnetic in nature. <br>Extra life: Collect a brain on the way to get an extra life.</p><p>Game currency is gold coins.</p><p>Note: Ads appear in between to support the game developer.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Mining Game"> 287.    The HinterLands: Mining Game  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Ackmi.com" title="Ackmi.com">Ackmi.com</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" class="description">  Mine the terrain for resources, build great structures, harvest plants, trees and mobs. <br>Play cooperative or competitive multiplayer with friends or random players!<p>★Features★<br>• Multiplayer, featuring player vs player combat, and cooperative exploration and building <br>• Parkour style movement- run up walls, do flips, climb over ledges, run and slide under things, wall kick/jump between walls<br>• Fight with fast combos, slow strong attacks, and block incoming enemy attacks. <br>• Take no damage, and unlimited blocks in creative mode</p><p>★Mine, Craft, Fight and Build!★<br>• Mine procedurally generated, unique worlds, with randomly generated terrain, and dynamic day/ night cycles<br>• Craft tons of blocks and items, and use them to build!<br>• Farm mobs, or destroy them for food to, and stop hunger<br>• Harvest trees and plants for food, potions, or seeds to replant and grow your own forests</p><p>★Multiplayer★<br>The HinterLands is an indie sandbox game, built with a heavy emphasis on multiplayer. <br>You have more multiplayer options than other games on the market:<br>• Play on the free public servers and play with tons of people, Google Play, wifi/LAN, or bluetooth!<br>• Dance with people, or join a team color using chat</p><p>★Why Play?★<br>• Play with other people: create amazing structures, or just battle it out with swords, crossbows and guns.<br>• Help shape the development of the game, add ideas, and watch the game evolve.<br>• Explore the world, and see new content added to the game, and like to provide feedback on what you like/ don’t like.</p><p>★Who isn’t it for?★<br>• Someone looking for a completely finished game. The game is in alpha, and will continually be updated to fix bugs/ add content until it is finished.<br>• If you’re not willing to let us know what you like/ don’t like specifics on bugs.</p><p>The HinterLands was the FIRST (early 2013) multiplayer 2d mining game on the market, and was released early in alpha to encourage people to contribute to development, since there was nothing similar on the market. Since then it has grown a ton, and keeps growing thanks to player feedback!</p><p>★Features Coming Soon★<br>• Redesigned UI: easier inventory system, more advanced item, armor and weapon crafting system, equippable armor and clothes, and quests<br>• Bosses, more mobs, and more biomes</p><p>★Planned features★<br>• Player vs. Player: Free for all, capture the flag, team oriented with different classes, tower defense with creeps and towers<br>• NPC’s: Characters to give you quests, buy and trade items<br>• Pets: Animals to join you on quests and in combat (and mounts!)</p><p>★Instructions★<br>• Customize and create your player and world<br>• Play on a public server, Google Play, wifi, bluetooth, or single player game<br>• Mine dirt, stone, ect with the pickaxe. Chop trees and items with the axe. Use the hammer to break down backgrounds or items<br>• Use the fast attack button to combo attacks, or the strong attack for higher damage. Use the shield to become invincible<br>• Pinch to zoom in / out of the world; open your inventory and pinch to increase / decrease button size. Customize your buttons in the game under settings -&gt;controls. Move items by holding them down for 1s, or split stacks by holding down longer<br>• Build amazing structures, upgrade your tools, and share on our facebook page! http://goo.gl/vsclYF<br>• More instructions on the wiki: http://goo.gl/UZcn2N</p><p>★ FREE VERSION: The free version is supported with ads, but you can SAVE YOUR WORLD, progress, characters, almost everything. If you buy the paid version, you get a BACKERS REWARD that you can use to teleport to and from your spawn point (and a larger inventory)</p><p>The game is still in alpha, because there is so much still that we want to add. There are only 2 of us working on it, but we appreciate everyone who plays the game, helps contribute by finding bugs, adding ideas, suggestions and feedback</p><p>Join the forums: http://goo.gl/Zxe3hb</p><p>Please leave a 5 star review, and let us know what you would like to see added first to the game</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Android.<p>http://www.dungeonnightmares.com/greenlight<br>http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=326607919</p><p>Thank you for your support :)</p><p>=====</p><p>地下城噩梦 Dungeon Nightmares是一款惊悚类的冒险解谜游戏，游戏中你将坠入一个伸手不见五指的漆黑地牢，后面有紧追不舍的神秘怪物，你需要借助微弱的亮光和少量的提示，摸索各种机关，最终逃离这里。 </p><p>地牢梦魇被称为手机上最可怕的游戏通过公测的玩家。 </p><p>你去睡觉，每天晚上，你会发现自己在无尽的噩梦，你必须逃离。 </p><p>地牢充斥着为你收集的物品，包括蜡烛，可以帮助照亮你的道路。但要注意，你不会是一个人在那里。 </p><p>你必须每天晚上和进步求生存，以另一找到关于这个噩梦更多的线索。 </p><p>什么做这些噩梦是什么意思？那个女孩是谁？这是后话你找出... </p><p>特点: <br>- 强烈的恐怖气氛 <br>- 战斗 - 游戏少 <br>- 难度与尺度每次晚上生存 <br>- 在地牢“恐怖”的多元化 <br>- 动态AI的基础上，如何发挥这一变化的敌人 <br>- 全3D的设计水平 <br>- 丰富的3D环绕音效（耳机推荐） <br>- 图形特效（雾，背景虚化颗粒） <br>- 传统的双棍控制 <br>- 互动直观的触摸控制 <br>- 技术Unity3D的 </p><p>什么样的球员说（感谢TouchArcade社区！）： This story originated in the early 80s with the game Marble Madness. Now you have another opportunity to plunge into exciting and memorable atmosphere of ball travels through unimaginable worlds and routes.<p>The main goal of the game is to pass through all levels and reach the maximum score. Various elements and obstacles are being introduced as one moves onto new levels, meaning that the complexity and level of puzzle solving required are gradually increasing as the game progresses.</p><p>You will find 5 lives to spend and the unique ability to change material and physical characteristics of the ball turning it to wood, stone or paper. However, this feature is to be used only at special transformation points.</p><p>Features:</p><p>• Classic gameplay<br>• Deep atmosphere<br>• Modern graphics<br>• Realistic physics <br>• Intuitive controls <br>• No time limits<br>• Free-to-play<br>• English-language support</p><p>Ball Resurrection is accessible for all ages, easy-to-learn and control. Tề Thiên Đại Thánh  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=VTC+Mobile-%C4%90%E1%BA%A1i+N%C3%A1o+Thi%C3%AAn+Cung,+Chi%E1%BA%BFn+thu%E1%BA%ADt+T%C3%A2y+Du" title="VTC Mobile-Đại Náo Thiên Cung, Chiến thuật Tây Du">VTC Mobile-Đại Náo Thiên Cung, Chiến thuật Tây Du</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.vtcmobilehcm.dainaothiencung"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKgooEiYKIGNvbS52dGNtb2JpbGVoY20uZGFpbmFvdGhpZW5jdW5nEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Bản lĩnh đấu TÀI không đấu SỨC - Đẳng cấp đấu TRÍ không đấu LỰC<br>Cùng Tề Thiên Đại Thánh - Đại Náo Thiên Cung ngay hôm nay!<p>Ưu đãi Đặc Biệt cho game thủ Đại Náo Thiên Cung:<br>1. Tải game tặng miễn phí 5 tướng cực phẩm 5 sao<br>2. Làm nhiệm vụ nhận 10.000 KNB không khóa<br>3. Mỗi ngày, được tặng thêm 6 tướng bất kỳ - Kéo dài vĩnh viễn<br>4. Đua TOP lực chiến - Người chiến thắng sẽ được DÁT VÀNG tên lên GẬY NHƯ Ý của Tề Thiên Đại Thánh (dát vàng thật, có giấy bảo chứng chất lượng vàng)<br>5. Cửu đại sự kiện chào đón người chơi mới<br>6. Và hàng hoạt sự kiện hấp dẫn khác</p><p>*********************************************</p><p>Game Đại Náo Thiên Cung có gì hay?</p><p>Nếu xem đồ họa game là vẻ đẹp hình thể và nội dung game là vẻ đẹp tâm hồn. Thì game Đại Náo Thiên Cung do VTC Mobile phát hành sẽ là một cô gái bạn ước ao được cưới làm vợ.</p><p>1. Tính năng game là sự kết hợp hoàn hảo giữa một pho tiểu thuyết kiệt xuất của nền văn học thế giới với công nghệ hiện đại của thế kỷ 21.<br>- 81 kiếp nạn thỉnh chân kinh được chuyển tải qua hệ thống 2000 phụ bản.<br>- Các Thiên binh - Thiên tướng, Thần tiên - Yêu ma trong truyện đều được thổi hồn như thật qua hình vẽ trong game. Không những thế, ở mỗi cấp ngoại hình và phong thái của tướng đều có sự thay đổi.<br>- Các mối quan hệ sư đồ, vợ chồng, anh em, kẻ thù được sao chép lại với tính năng Duyên phận, Bộ tướng.<br>- Những món bảo bối, vũ khí riêng của từng nhân vật trong truyện sẽ được cá nhân hóa trong game bằng hệ thống vũ khí chuyên thuộc bên cạnh các món vũ khí phổ thông<br>- Và con rất nhiều những tính năng đặc sắc khác như Quét tháp đoạt bảo, Vòng quay may mắn, Tiên nữ tán hoa, Đấu tiên ma, Chiến tam thanh, Chư thần chi chiến, Đại náo thiên cung.... chắc chán sẽ đủ để bạn đắm mình trong thế giới Tây Du kỳ ảo.</p><p>2. Đồ họa game Đại Náo Thiên Cung mê hoặc đến từng đường nét, tinh xảo đến từng chi tiết đến nỗi đủ để bạn nhìn thấy sợi chỉ vàng trên áo Ngọc Hoàng hay ánh sáng lấp lánh phát ra từ áo cà sa của Đường Tăng.</p><p>3. Công nghệ hiện đại giúp tối ưu hóa hiệu suất của chiếc dế yêu, chơi lâu không bị nóng máy, ít tốn pin, tiết kiệm 3G, với 10% pin vẫn đủ để bạn chơi game đến 40p<br>Bên cạnh đó khi chơi game bạn còn có thể thoải mái 8 với bạn bè người yêu, đồng nghiệp và hàng triệu người trong và ngoài nước với hệ thống Facebook được cấy thẳng vào game.</p><p>4. Sau 6 tháng phát hành ở thị trường quốc tế, game đã xây dựng một cộng đồng chơi game đông đảo với số lượng người chơi gần bằng dân số Singapore. Tuy nhiên đến thời điểm này, vẫn chưa ai tìm ra trận pháp vô đối của game.</p><p>5. Đặc biệt, với tham vọng thực hiện mục tiêu đạt được 1 triệu người chơi trong 3 tháng, lần đầu tiên game thủ sẽ được tận hưởng cảm giác chơi game như GM (game master):<br>- Tải game tặng miễn phí 5 tướng cực phẩm 5 sao<br>- Làm nhiệm vụ nhận 10.000 KNB không khóa<br>- Mỗi ngày, được tặng thêm 6 tướng bất kỳ - Kéo dài vĩnh viễn<br>Đặc biệt các KNB này đều là KNB không khóa. Điều này mang lại cho gamer một cảm giác giải trí đích thực sau những giờ làm việc căng thẳng mà không quá phụ thuộc vào túi tiền.</p><p>Đường tăng mất 14 năm đi thỉnh kinh, Đạo diễn Dương Khiết mất 7 năm ròng rã để chuyển tải thành một tác phẩm kinh điển. Vậy bạn cần bao lâu để chinh phục Đại Náo Thiên Cung và dát vàng tên mình lên Gậy Như Ý của Tề Thiên Đại Thánh?</p><p>*********************************************</p><p>CSKH : 1900 1530<br>Email : 進擊的火柴人<br>一款由火柴人作為主角的刺激的冒險遊戲！<br>火柴人來到這殘酷的世界，挑戰一個個反人類組織。火柴人喪屍軍團、火柴人軍隊、火柴人街頭流氓，一個個殘暴的組織，背後有莫大的陰謀。你，作為一名勇士，孤軍作戰，來到他們的大本營，破解一個個謎團，粉碎他們的野心！這是一款免費的，讓人上癮，愛不惜手的遊戲，千萬別錯過！<p>遊戲玩法：<br>1.通過屏幕提示，拾取道具，通過關卡。<br>2.每一層都有不同類型的火柴人看守，如何使用資源去對付他們，這將掌握在你手中。</p><p>遊戲提示：<br>第一關：通過點擊火柴人面前的箱子，進入箱子誘惑敵人靠近後把他擊斃，然後猛擊箱子打破箱子，走出來後撿起地上的刀，點擊右方門即可通關。<br>第二關：猛擊電梯下方的斷層邊緣，火柴人就會扶著邊緣，然後點擊電梯門下方的邊緣，跳躍到電梯口並且進入電梯。<br>第三關：點擊手電筒右方的刀並撿起來，緩慢走過火柴人殭屍群，再用後方的道具把殭屍群進行擊斃。</p><p>如何通過後面的關卡，將取決於你的智慧！</p><p></p><p></p> 亞特蘭蒂斯" 的地方。 <br>那裡曾是海神" 波塞冬" 的領土，擁有著巨額的財富和高度的文明。 <br>數以萬計的魚人" 卡美拉" 在此生存，並守護著這個神秘的地方。 <br>傳說，這裡藏有海神遺落的神器——黃金三叉戟。 <br>誰若擁有它，便能在海上掀起滔天巨浪，呼風喚雨，無所不能。 <br>它的存在， 永葆亞特蘭蒂斯生生不息的活力。 <br>數百年來，人們一直懼怕它卻渴求擁有它。 <br>於是乎，吉德、麥哲倫、黑鬍子等海盜和水手們紛紛慕名而來。 <br>目的只有一個，一探神權的究竟，將其占為已用。 <br>不過，" 卡美拉" 們怎能夠就此坐以待斃？她們傾巢出動，捍衛家園。 <br>而通往這片神奇大陸的金鑰，也只會被交到真正的勇士手中。 <br>一場腥風血雨的戰爭，就此拉開序幕！</p><p></p><p></p> <span </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  很久很久以前，遠在平安時代，鬼族領袖酒吞童子率領著眾多部下四處征戰，企圖取代人類成為日本的霸主。<p>他們有著常人無法超越的力量，一度成功攻陷京都周圍幾個重要地點，讓天皇陷入一陣混亂。當時的各部隊都束手無策。</p><p>所幸源賴光帶領著一部分的武士以及賴光四天王。靠計策攻入了鬼族的根據地，成功的將酒吞童子的肉身給斬除，並且將靈魂給封印在頭顱中。</p><p>無計可施的酒吞童子就這樣靜靜的沉睡了數百年……</p><p>直到有一天...<br>--<br>戰國松姬傳是一款以日本戰國時代為背景的RPG冒險遊戲，<br>讓玩家能夠跟著戰國武將一同討伐鬼族、體驗精美且華麗的戰鬥場面。</p><p>玩家將活用各個角色的特殊能力以及戰鬥技巧，並且在遊戲中蒐集各種裝備，<br>用以挑戰更高難度的關卡及未知的敵將。</p><p>遊戲共可操作十多名人物對抗各種魑魅魍魎，<br>並在超過四十個關卡中體驗一夫當關的戰鬥快感，<br>享受戰國時代與現實交錯的狂熱大亂鬥！</p><p>--<br>本遊戲下載後可以免費玩前三章，如果滿意的話可以再購買之後的關卡繼續劇情。<br>您的支持將是我們活下去的希望！(不唬爛XD)<br>--<br>聯絡開發者:<br>{uni}: Try to keep yourself safe to complete mission.<br>	Metal combat is about a hero, soldier, warrior of the special force which sent by the government to wipe out all the enemies genisys. You will be armed with new guns, new weapons powerful one to complete the mission. On the way, the will be some package sent by the special force, could be new gun, new weapon, shield, lives, new skills. Use every weapons, skills you have to shoot, kill, fight and slug as much as possible to defeat the boss. Run Cow Run》中的超级奶牛不仅能在地上跑也能在天上飞，一边收集金币一边躲过各种障碍。当有道具使用的时候，奶牛可能会变成无敌状态，还有可能召唤一只斗牛陪它一起横冲直撞。</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" How to Train a Draco: The Game  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Pocket+Scientists" title="Pocket Scientists">Pocket Scientists</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.pocketscientists.rmtrdragon"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5wb2NrZXRzY2llbnRpc3RzLnJtdHJkcmFnb24QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Draco is simply is another name for the Dragon, the huge, mystical, magical beast from the fairy tales or the movies. Some people are trying to kill dragons in the movies, but not in this game. Others are smart enough to know, that the best ever mount are dragons, as they fly, they are powerful on it's own, and they are loyal. But your dragon is extremely selfish, stubborn, obstinate so to tame your dragon needs a lot of time, effort, luck and of course a lot of talent, so act as a main hero of a fantasy movie! Now it's your time, to be part of a Tale never told, a Movie never made, a book never written where people are not against dragons, where knights and nobles are riding this beasts up to the skies and their dragons help them on their adventures. Your 2 goals are the following: to train your dragon for the adventures of the future, and to tame it for being the best ever mount in the history of any tales.<br>You have 2 choices: a road to immortality begins riding your dragon, or your road to oblivion begins not riding it. And who knows - maybe one day a movie or 2 will propagate your unmatched adventures and glory.<p>Features:<br>- Unique and exciting  Dragon Controlling game<br>- Google Play Leaderboards, 4.5/5</p><p>《发条传说: 格拉斯与英克》是一款蒸汽朋克风格的冒险游戏。它不仅包含侦探情节，还有大量的动作场面，比如潜入、与怪物战斗、甚至是滑翔飞行！</p><p> 持续不断的奇怪地震让世界各地的城市陆续被摧毁。安伯斯•英克博士是科技革命的先锋，他决心探寻这一超自然现象背后的原因。</p><p>免费试玩，在游戏中解锁完整的冒险吧！</p><p>为了进行研究，他来到了霍瓦德，这是一座高山上的小镇，在它旁边还有一座神秘的巴伯家族城堡。然而，英克博士在到达城堡宅邸后不久就神秘失踪了。 </p><p>拯救英克博士并揭开真相的重任落到了他的挚友 — 特工伊凡杰琳•格拉斯身上。她必须与自己的机械乌鸦密切配合，闯入戒备森严的城堡，并与戈特兰大工程师对峙。</p><p>特工格拉斯很快就意识到，在这革命性的一刻，巨大的威胁并不仅来自于人类……</p><p>•	扮演英克博士，和他的同伴马修一起潜入霍瓦德堡<br>•	内涵丰富，新奇独特的蒸汽朋克设定 <br>•	机械乌鸦马修将会成为玩家的好朋友<br>•	38个 精美的手绘场景。<br>•	惊险刺激的侦探故事配以精彩的动作元素<br>•	多元化的冒险游戏：滑翔飞行，冒充士兵，打败机械生物<br>•	寻找30多只隐藏的蒸汽虫 <br>•	解锁9大成就<br>•	额外冒险（“英克的故事”）带领你体验主线剧情的前传</p><p>+++ 更多ARTIFEX MUNDI游戏! +++<br>&gt; 深海恶梦: 塞壬的召唤 <br>&gt; 深海恶梦: 被诅咒的心 射彈管理員</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" 《射彈英雄傳》邀您一起體驗最刺激的轟炸射擊！<p>《射彈英雄傳》是一款大型多人線上手遊，充滿驚喜的休閒回合制戰鬥模式，讓您可以根據抛物線原理，發射炮彈攻擊對手或者破壞地形，高手過招，一決勝負。<br>遊戲內有趣的好友互動、刺激謀略的PK戰鬥、豐富的副本挑戰、獨具特色的武器必殺技，以及華麗的技能特效，讓您從輕鬆簡單中，獲得刺激有趣的對戰體驗。</p><p>【遊戲特色】<br>簡易的操作模式，讓您輕鬆融入競技對抗的刺激快感。<br>可愛的對話表情，立刻拉近玩家隔空交戰的遙遠距離。<br>華麗的戰鬥特效，突破拋物射擊遊戲帶來的感官體驗。<br>60萬種裝備組合，瞬間變身成為捉摸不透的特戰部隊。<br>獨具特色的武器，搭配必殺技發揮瞬間秒殺的戰鬥力。</p><p>粉絲團：https://www.facebook.com/app.sh.gameflier 510.    謎解き脱出ゲーム 妖怪！アヤカシ町からの脱出  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=SEEC+inc." title="SEEC inc.">SEEC inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.seec.escape.ayakashi"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2pwLnNlZWMuZXNjYXBlLmF5YWthc2hpEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  - 脱出難易度：★★★★☆(ちょいむず)<p>迷い込んでしまった場所は妖怪の住む町「アヤカシ町」<br>そこで出会った少女「まつり」は何者かに顔を盗られてしまったらしい・・・<br>ストーリーを進める事で展開がどんどん広がっていくアドベンチャー脱出ゲーム<br>「まつり」と共に妖怪の住む町から脱出せよ！</p><p><br>【妖怪アヤカシ町からの脱出の特徴】<br>◆妖怪が脱出の鍵をにぎる！<br>「アヤカシ町」にある道具や妖怪との会話が謎を解くカギに！<br>気になる所はタップしよう</p><p>◆妖怪との対決！<br>なぜ、この町に迷い込んだのか・・<br>それにはある妖怪の陰謀が隠されていた<br>謎を解きながら悪い妖怪をやっつけよう！</p><p>◆「クエスト」を全てクリアしてもう一つのエンディングへ<br>メインストーリーとは別に各怪にだけしか登場しない妖怪がいるぞ<br>全ての妖怪の悩みを解決すると通常エンドとは違う真のエンディングを見ることができる。</p><p>◆「ヒント機能」搭載<br>脱出ゲーム初心者の方でも大丈夫！<br>特殊アイテム「鍵」を使って、各怪のヒントを見る事が可能！</p><p>【妖怪アヤカシ町からの脱出の遊び方】<br>タップやスワイプだけのシンプルな操作性<br>怪（ステージ）をクリアすると自動でセーブされます。<br>無料で遊べ暇つぶしに最適です。</p><p><br>【対応OS】<br>Android 2.3.3以上</p><p>【動作確認端末】<br>・Google Nexus 7 2012年モデル (Android 4.3)<br>・Galaxy S4 (Android 4.2.2)<br>・Xperia A (Android 4.1.2)<br>・Galaxy S2 (Android 4.0.3)<br>・Xperia ray (Android 2.3.4)<br>・Xperia acro SO-02C (Android 2.3.3)</p><p>【注意事項】<br>・攻略方法についてのご質問には一切お答えできません。<br>・第三者による攻略サイト・攻略アプリの内容に関して、当アプリ側は一切関与しておりません。<br>・当アプリの動作が不安定な場合、お使いの端末で起動中の別アプリを停止することで、症状が軽くなる可能性があります。</p><p>【インストールに問題が発生した方へ】<br>アプリのインストールに問題が生じた場合、GooglePlayの「ダウンロードに関するトラブルシューティング」をご確認下さい。<br>https://support.google.com/googleplay/bin/answer.py?hl=ja&amp;answer=1067233</p><p>【ゲーム中の効果音について】<br>本ゲーム内で使用している効果音の一部に、<br>下記サイト様のものを使用させて頂いております。<br>この場を借りてお礼申し上げます。<br>・ポケットサウンド 脱出ゲーム　赤ずきん〜お花畑編〜  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" <div class="description">  ◆説明<p>「脱出ゲーム　赤ずきん〜お花畑編〜」</p><p>ステージクリア型「あそびごころ。脱出ゲームアプリ第18弾！」<br>今回の、テーマは「童話　赤ずきん」<br>おつかいを頼まれ、おばあさんの家まで行こうとした赤ずきんは、道中で色々な動物や仕掛けにはまって中々たどり着けない！<br>様々な仕掛けを解いて、おばあさんの家まで行けるかな？<br>更におばあさんの家へ着いたあとも、おばあさんは家におらず…？<br>道中は花畑や森や小川で。家の中でもたくさんの謎解きが待っている！<br>操作方法はタップだったり、端末を振ったり、と少しだけ変わった操作も盛り込まれてるよ！<br>脱出ゲームをしたことがない人でも簡単にプレイできる、初心者におすすめな脱出ゲーム！<br>【あそびごころ。脱出ゲームの特徴】<br>１ステージのボリュームにこだわった内容と、ちょっとした遊び心を加えて子どもや大人でも遊ぶころができるのが特徴。<br>じっくり考えて謎解きを楽しもう！ヒント（答え）はなるべく避けてチャレンジしてみてね。<br>全部クリアーすると全ステージが選択式で遊ぶことができるようになるよ！<br>【攻略のポイント】<br>画面の至る所をくまなくタップしてみよう！<br>同じ場所でも何度かタップしてみると新しい発見があるかも！<br>ステージ内に登場するキャラクターたちに話しかけてみてね、何かヒントがもらえるかも！<br>～遊び方～<br>画面の色んなところをくまなくタップして調べてみよう。<br>画面上にあるボタンでホームに戻ったりステージ選択したりできるよ。<br>問題によってはアイテムのアップからまた色んな仕掛けが現れたりするからくまなく調べてみよう！<br>～ヒントページ～<br>メニューからヒントをタップしてみてね。<br>ヒントを見てもわからない時は究極のヒントボタンで更に詳しい答えもあるから行き詰まっても安心！<br>～紹介～<br>あそびごころ。は皆さんのクチコミ（口コミ）をもとにした暇つぶし無料ゲームアプリを作っています。<br>「こんな脱出がやってみたい！」「こんなGAMEが欲しい！」など、その他の意見も募集中！下記公式ページから投稿してね。<br>■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■<br>【公式】<br>twitter→https://twitter.com/ASOBIGOCORO123<br>アカウント名＠ASOBIGOKORO123<br>facebook→https://www.facebook.com/ASOBIGOCORO</p><p></p> This is the original side scrolling action adaptation of this classic fairy tale.<p>Cinderella, or The Little Glass Slipper (French: Cendrillon ou La Petite Pantoufle de verre, Italian: Cenerentola, German: Aschenputtel, Russian Золушка, Zolushka), is a European folk tale or fable embodying a myth-element of unjust oppression. Some say this is the most famous and best classic story for kids with lots of action, love and teachings of true hearth.</p><p>The greatest story tellers introduced the tale of Cinderella princess to public, like Basile, the Grimm Brothers with their fairy tale books and even Disney with the movie shown in cinema. A wide range of original book, theatrical, opera, TV and original movie adaptations were done so far not just for kids.</p><p>The shoes of Cinderella are missing. These are not simple shoes, but crystal slippers made together with a beautiful princess costume by a secret spell for the feast of the kingdom. Everybody was amazed in the palace by the best looking princess. The son of the official king, the Prince has fallen in love with her. Just like in the original fairy tale, this is the best princess story for kids that you can be read in a book or can be watched as a movie, or played as a game. </p><p>MAIN FEATURES<br>★ Run, find and title="脱出ゲーム「ヴァンパイアホームズ〜ホームズからの脱出〜」"> 530.    脱出ゲーム「ヴァンパイアホームズ〜ホームズからの脱出〜」  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWpwLmNvLmN1Y3VyaS52aGZvdXJ0aBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  2015年4月にTVアニメ化決定！<br>脱出推理ゲーム「VAMPIRE HOLMES」（ヴァンパイア ホームズ）第４弾！<br>今回はなんと！！“ホームズから脱出”！？<p>謎を解かない！推理をしない！迷探偵ホームズが、<br>あなたの元気を取り戻すために謎解きゲームを用意してくれた！？</p><p>その名も“俺（？）からの脱出”！</p><p>“迷”探偵ホームズは普通なら謎にしない“あんな事”から“こんな事”まで謎として出題！？<br>全ての謎を解いて、ホームズから抜け出そう！</p><p>広告なし・完全無料で最後までプレイ出来る！<br>今回は新システムとして“魔導書マーブック”機能を追加！<br>魔力の宿った謎をマーブックで解き明かそう！</p><p>＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊<br>■ストーリー<br>最近何をしても楽しくない助手のあなた。<br>そんなあなたにホームズが１冊の本を手渡した。<br>その名も“魔導書・マーブック”。<br>マーブックを使って答えれば、この世の魔力を宿した謎が全て解けるという。</p><p>ノリ気でなかったあなた。<br>しかし、半ば強制的にホームズの考えだした“俺（？）からの脱出”という脱出ゲームに参加させられてしまう。</p><p>出題者はホームズ自身。<br>一筋縄ではいかない問題ばかり！　謎といいつつ事務所の掃除も手伝わされて…。</p><p>あなたは全ての謎を解いてホームズから抜け出す事が出来るのか！</p><p>＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊<br>【キャラクター紹介】<br>■ホームズ（CV：瀬名快伸）<br>ロンドンで探偵業をしている、謎多き青年。<br>謎を解かない。推理をしない。新種の迷探偵。<br>だが、依頼された内容はいつの間にか片付けており、<br>探偵としての評価はかなり高い。<br>ロンドン市警からヴァンパイア捜索の任務を秘密裏に受けている。<br>拳銃を持っているが弾は一発しか入っていない。<br>喧噪（けんそう）が苦手。昼間は眠い。人付き合いはしたくない。<br>面倒なことはしたくない。<br>と、ひたすらアンニュイな生活を送っている。</p><p>【アイテム紹介】<br>■マーブック<br>　魔導書。<br>　この世の魔力を宿した謎を解き明かす事の出来る、スペシャルアイテム。<br>　数字、アルファベット、カナ、記号を書き込む事が出来る。<br>　まだまだ謎があるようだが…</p><p>＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊<br>■謎解き脱出ゲーム × ADV<br>謎を解くだけでなくストーリーも重視した“謎解き脱出 × ADV”形式！<br>ステージをクリアしていくたびにあなたの悩みが吹き飛んでいく…？</p><p>全てのステージの謎を解いて、あなたを振り回す迷探偵ホームズから脱出しよう！</p><p>＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊<br>■フルボイス仕様<br>全話を通してフルボイス！<br>ホームズと実際に会話し、探索しているような臨場感！</p><p>＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊<br>■マーブック機能<br>マーブックを使って、謎を解き明かそう！<br>答えられる所はアイコンが出現！<br>操作はタップのみの簡単機能です！</p><p>＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊<br>■「VAMPIRE
